FEEP-MAPPING.SQL: INSERT INTO feep_tablemodulerelation (id, moduleid, tableid, relationType, tableType) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE feep_tablemodulerelation SET moduleid = ?, tableid = ?, relationType = ?, tableType = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, moduleid, tableid, relationType, tableType FROM feep_tablemodulerelation
